original_text: When they which were about him saw what would follow, they said unto him, Lord, shall we smite with the sword?
korean_text: 그의 주위 사람들이 그 된 일을 보고 여짜오되 주여 우리가 칼로 치리이까 하고

sentences.original_text: When they which were about him saw
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주변에 있던 자들이 볼 때

sentences.original_text: shall we smite with the sword?
